description:
a: artist book with printed and hand bound pages; cover is teal on top half with a grey mountainous landscape on bottom; first 1/2 has a hand stitched binding with names on off-white pages and second half is folded accordion style and has b/w wood cut prints on one side and b/w with grey tone portraits on the other side
b: black fabric covered box with printed landscape on front and interior
title: Memory and Landscape: Unveiling the Historic Truths of Chile, 1973-1990
